component.name: Query Builder
component.description: A powerful query builder component for constructing database queries without coding, featuring drag-and-drop condition building, logical operators, and field selection. Supports filter grouping, query validation, and export functionality for flexible data querying.

variants.name: Default
variants.description: Square query builder component with intuitive interactive interface, featuring drag-and-drop rule reordering, AND/OR logic toggle, and nested grouping support. Includes real-time validation, field selection, operators, value inputs, and SQL export functionality.
